channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Activo P1 Review: Wired Sound, Tired Looks
item.description: Activo's P1 is a decent portable music player, but it looks pretty bland.

item.title: The Best Smart Rings, Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: A svelte smart ring can track important health metrics and doesn't need to be charged every day.

item.title: AI Will Understand Humans Better Than Humans Do
item.description: Or so says a controversial Stanford researcher, who finds that the latest systems have, against all odds, mastered a high-level cognitive skill.

item.title: Chinese military researchers reportedly used Meta AI to develop defense chatbot

item.title: 9 Best Advent Calendars (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether your loved one likes sweets, spices, or something a little stronger, these treat-filled Advent calendars make a great gift.

item.title: Former Caribou founder launches Further, a fintech that’s focused on helping people buy homes

item.title: Instagram upgrades DMs with focus on creators

item.title: LG Ultragear 34GS95QE Curved OLED Gaming Monitor Review: Big Curve
item.description: This is one of the most curved ultrawide displays I’ve tried, and that curvature makes all the difference.

item.title: How to build a company that can save the world and generate a profit
